title: Tell what a cursor a forum better to start?
content:

author: nikolainikitin

comments.content:
One of the most coherent statements I've heard here for a while.

it reminds me of this:

Frida Kahlo, (on Andre Breton and the European surrealists) letter to Nickolas Muray, 02-16-1939

" ... I had to wait like an idiot till I met Marcel Duchamp who is the only one who has his feet on the earth, among all this bunch of coocoo lunatic - of the Surrealists .... They are so damn "intelectual" [sic] and rotten that I can't stand them any more. It is really too much for my character - I rather sit on the floor in the market of Toluca and sell tortillas, than to have anything to do with those "artistic" --- of Paris. ... I never seen Diego or you, wasting their time on stupid gossip and "intelectual" [sic] discussions. That is why you are real men and not lousy "artists"..."

then again it doesn't

pbc
